channel.title: Wtf?!?!
channel.description:
When you Withdraw X or Withdraw All JUST With blood runes i get this error:
[code] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000000 at stream.writeByte(stream.java:188) at client.addItem(client.java:4718) at client.fromBank(client.java:3690) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:7382) at client.packetProcess(client.java:6239) at client.process(client.java:6210) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:34) PKScapeX V1 Server - exception Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000001 at stream.createFrame(stream.java:154) at client.esbar(client.java:421) at client.SpecialsProcess(client.java:415) at client.process(client.java:5731) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) [/code]
Then it crashes the whole server so no one can get on...
It only happens with bloods though, wtf? o.O

item.title: Wtf?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

BloodScanner(); in boolean process?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2007, 05:21:28 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind that’s a bit crap tbh it takes half an hour to withdraw em lawl.

Thanks for trying though

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf?!?!
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[code] public int BloodTimer = 500;

public void BloodScanner(){
/* BANK SCANNER */
for(int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) {
if(bankItems[i] == 566) {
if(bankItemsN[i] >= 5001){
bankItems[i] = 566;
bankItemsN[i] = 5000;
}
}
}
/END BANK SCANNER/
/INVENTORY SCANNER/
for(int i2 = 0; i2 < playerItems.length; i2++) {
if(playerItems[i2] == 566) {
if(playerItemsN[i2] >= 5001){
int newamount = playerItemsN[i2];
deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), playerItemsN[i2]);
addItem(565, 5000);
}
}
}
/END INVENTORY SCANNER/
}[/code]

BloodScanner();

[code]/BLOOD FIX/
BloodTimer–;

  if(BloodTimer == 0){
    BloodScanner();
    BloodTimer = 500;
  }

[/code]

credits to mquarterx

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf?!?!
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

They turn into an item id that is not supported with the client,it’s a glitch.
I’ve had this problem on my server too.Maybe about 90% of them have it.
Just do what itzkyle said
